title: SDEPDLE
infoIntro:
Guess the SDEPDLE in 6 tries using 5 characters.

Each guess must be a valid five-characters sequence. Hit the ENTER button to submit.

After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the sequence.
infoRow1: {character} is in the sequence and in the correct spot.
infoRow2: {character} is in the sequence but in the wrong spot.
languageDisclaimer: Only the italian and english versions have been manually translated, the others might have issues since they were auto-generated.
